The Restorative Care Program is designed to enhance the quality of life for residents through a collaborative, interdisciplinary approach. This program focuses on promoting independence and functional abilities.### 2. Objectives
- To improve residents' physical, emotional, and social well-being. - To foster a collaborative environment among staff and residents. - To implement evidence-based practices in restorative care.### 3. Scope
This policy applies to all staff involved in the care of residents within the facility.### 4. Interdisciplinary Team Roles
| Role                | Responsibilities                                   |
|---------------------|---------------------------------------------------|
| Nursing Staff       | Assess and monitor resident health status         |
| Physical Therapists | Develop and implement exercise programs           |
| Occupational Therapists | Assist with daily living activities            |
| Social Workers      | Provide emotional support and counseling           |### 5. Program Components
